synopsis.text: Yuiga and Asumi find themselves in a peculiar situation as they pretend to be a couple on a beach date, all in an effort to maintain a ruse for Asumi's father. As the day unfolds, Yuiga encounters his teacher, Mafuyu Kirisu, in an unexpected predicament after she misplaces her bikini top. This OVA episode, based on chapters 48 and 49, presents a series of comedic and awkward moments as Yuiga navigates these unforeseen circumstances while attempting to remain a gentleman. Prepare for a day filled with laughter, misunderstandings, and a touch of romance in this special seaside adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
